description:
The Bibot Box contains a classic robot vanity set for your character in Portal Knights including:

- Bibot Arms
- Bibot Body
- Bibot Helmet
- Bibot Legs

Access your robot vanity set from the in-game shop in Portal Knights.

The world of Elysia needs YOU! Join this cooperative, 3D sandbox action RPG to level up your character, craft epic weapons, conquer enemies in real-time, and build almost anything! Craft your adventure. Forge your hero. Become the ultimate Portal Knight!
name: Portal Knights - Bibot Box
